function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in employment","Impact":"Increase of inactive population","Mitigation":"Investment in job creation and training programs","Technologies":"Job matching platforms, online learning platforms","People":"Unemployed individuals, inactive population","Owner":"Government, employers, training institutions"},{"Description":"Collapse in retail sales","Impact":"Crisis in commercial services","Mitigation":"Diversification of products and services, investment in online commerce","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, market analysis tools","People":"Retail workers, commercial service providers","Owner":"Business owners, market analysts, online platform operators"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in remote working","Impact":"Consequent crisis of commercial services","Mitigation":"Revise commercial strategies, invest in remote service delivery","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, online service platforms","People":"Remote workers, commercial service providers","Owner":"Business owners, remote service providers"}]}
